trans-unit.source: List of available Connectors and API Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: List of available Connectors and API Apps | Microsoft Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Read about the Connectors and API Apps in Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Read about the Connectors and API Apps in Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Connectors and API Apps List to use in your Logic Apps
trans-unit.target: Connectors and API Apps List to use in your Logic Apps

trans-unit.source: Learn about all the available connectors and API Apps created by Microsoft to use within your Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn about all the available connectors and API Apps created by Microsoft to use within your Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: For pricing information and a list of what is included with each Service Tier, see [Azure App Service Pricing](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/app-service/).
trans-unit.target: For pricing information and a list of what is included with each Service Tier, see [Azure App Service Pricing](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/app-service/).

trans-unit.source: Standard Connectors
trans-unit.target: Standard Connectors

trans-unit.source: The following table lists all the available connectors and API Apps created by Microsoft that are available with the Standard Connectors:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists all the available connectors and API Apps created by Microsoft that are available with the Standard Connectors:

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Use this connector to create a Hadoop cluster on Azure, submit different Hadoop jobs, and more.
trans-unit.target: Use this connector to create a Hadoop cluster on Azure, submit different Hadoop jobs, and more.

trans-unit.source: Azure Service Bus
trans-unit.target: Azure Service Bus

trans-unit.source: Can send messages from Service Bus Queues and Topics and receive messages from Service Bus Queues and Subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Can send messages from Service Bus Queues and Topics and receive messages from Service Bus Queues and Subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: Azure Storage Blob
trans-unit.target: Azure Storage Blob

trans-unit.source: Connects to Blob storage and can get, delete, list, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connects to Blob storage and can get, delete, list, and more.

trans-unit.source: Box
trans-unit.target: Box

trans-unit.source: Connects to Box and can upload, get, delete, list, and more file tasks.
trans-unit.target: Connects to Box and can upload, get, delete, list, and more file tasks.

trans-unit.source: Chatter
trans-unit.target: Chatter

trans-unit.source: Connects to Chatter and can post messages, search, and even retrieve new messages.
trans-unit.target: Connects to Chatter and can post messages, search, and even retrieve new messages.

trans-unit.source: Dropbox
trans-unit.target: Dropbox

trans-unit.source: Connect to Dropbox and can get, delete, list, and more file tasks.
trans-unit.target: Connect to Dropbox and can get, delete, list, and more file tasks.

trans-unit.source: Facebook
trans-unit.target: Facebook

trans-unit.source: Connect to Facebook and can publish messages, pictures, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connect to Facebook and can publish messages, pictures, and more.

trans-unit.source: You can also get messages and comments, get user information about different likes, including books and movies.
trans-unit.target: You can also get messages and comments, get user information about different likes, including books and movies.

trans-unit.source: File
trans-unit.target: File

trans-unit.source: Using this connector, you can connect to the on-premises file system or network and complete different file tasks, including uploading, deleting, listing files, and more.
trans-unit.target: Using this connector, you can connect to the on-premises file system or network and complete different file tasks, including uploading, deleting, listing files, and more.

trans-unit.source: FTP
trans-unit.target: FTP

trans-unit.source: FTPS
trans-unit.target: FTPS

trans-unit.source: Connects to an FTP / FTPS server and do different FTP tasks, including uploading, getting, deleting files, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connects to an FTP / FTPS server and do different FTP tasks, including uploading, getting, deleting files, and more.

trans-unit.source: HTTP
trans-unit.target: HTTP

trans-unit.source: The HTTP Listener opens an endpoint that acts as an HTTP server and listens to incoming HTTP or HTTPS requests.
trans-unit.target: The HTTP Listener opens an endpoint that acts as an HTTP server and listens to incoming HTTP or HTTPS requests.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP action doesn't require an API App and is supported natively within Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: The HTTP action doesn't require an API App and is supported natively within Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office 365
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office 365

trans-unit.source: The Office 365 Connector can send and receive emails, manage your calendar, and manage your contacts using your Office 365 account.
trans-unit.target: The Office 365 Connector can send and receive emails, manage your calendar, and manage your contacts using your Office 365 account.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft OneDrive
trans-unit.target: Microsoft OneDrive

trans-unit.source: Connects to your personal Microsoft OneDrive and upload, delete, list files, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connects to your personal Microsoft OneDrive and upload, delete, list files, and more.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft SharePoint
trans-unit.target: Microsoft SharePoint

trans-unit.source: Connects to on-premises Microsoft SharePoint Server or SharePoint Online to manage documents, and list items.
trans-unit.target: Connects to on-premises Microsoft SharePoint Server or SharePoint Online to manage documents, and list items.

trans-unit.source: Different authentication methods such as default credentials, OAuth 2.0, Windows authentication, and Form-Based authentication are supported.
trans-unit.target: Different authentication methods such as default credentials, OAuth 2.0, Windows authentication, and Form-Based authentication are supported.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Microsoft SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Connects to on-premises SQL Server or an Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: Connects to on-premises SQL Server or an Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: You can create, update, get, and delete entries on a SQL database table.
trans-unit.target: You can create, update, get, and delete entries on a SQL database table.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Yammer
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Yammer

trans-unit.source: Connects to Yammer to post messages and get new messages.
trans-unit.target: Connects to Yammer to post messages and get new messages.

trans-unit.source: [POP3](app-service-logic-connector-pop3.md) (Post Office Protocol)
trans-unit.target: [POP3](app-service-logic-connector-pop3.md) (Post Office Protocol)

trans-unit.source: Connect to a POP3 server to retrieve emails with attachments.
trans-unit.target: Connect to a POP3 server to retrieve emails with attachments.

trans-unit.source: QuickBooks
trans-unit.target: QuickBooks

trans-unit.source: You can complete different tasks including create, update, and query different entities from Intuit QuickBooks like customers, items, invoices, and so on.
trans-unit.target: You can complete different tasks including create, update, and query different entities from Intuit QuickBooks like customers, items, invoices, and so on.

trans-unit.source: [SFTP](app-service-logic-connector-sftp.md) (SSH File Transfer Protocol)
trans-unit.target: [SFTP](app-service-logic-connector-sftp.md) (SSH File Transfer Protocol)

trans-unit.source: Connects to SFTP and can upload, get, delete files, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connects to SFTP and can upload, get, delete files, and more.

trans-unit.source: [SMTP](app-service-logic-connector-smtp.md) (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol)
trans-unit.target: [SMTP](app-service-logic-connector-smtp.md) (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol)

trans-unit.source: Connects to a SMTP server and can send email with attachments.
trans-unit.target: Connects to a SMTP server and can send email with attachments.

trans-unit.source: Slack
trans-unit.target: Slack

trans-unit.source: Connect to Slack and post messages to Slack channels.
trans-unit.target: Connect to Slack and post messages to Slack channels.

trans-unit.source: Salesforce
trans-unit.target: Salesforce

trans-unit.source: Connect to your Salesforce account and manage accounts, leads, opportunities, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connect to your Salesforce account and manage accounts, leads, opportunities, and more.

trans-unit.source: SugarCRM
trans-unit.target: SugarCRM

trans-unit.source: Connects to SugarCRM Online and create, update, read, and more with different types of modules, including accounts, contacts, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Connects to SugarCRM Online and create, update, read, and more with different types of modules, including accounts, contacts, and so on.

trans-unit.source: Twilio
trans-unit.target: Twilio

trans-unit.source: Connects to Twilio and can send and get messages, get available numbers, managing incoming phone numbers, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connects to Twilio and can send and get messages, get available numbers, managing incoming phone numbers, and more.

trans-unit.source: Twitter
trans-unit.target: Twitter

trans-unit.source: Connects to Twitter and get timelines, post tweets, and more.
trans-unit.target: Connects to Twitter and get timelines, post tweets, and more.

trans-unit.source: Wait
trans-unit.target: Wait

trans-unit.source: Use this connector to delay the execution of your app.
trans-unit.target: Use this connector to delay the execution of your app.

trans-unit.source: You can delay the app for a specific duration or until an occurrence at a specific time.
trans-unit.target: You can delay the app for a specific duration or until an occurrence at a specific time.

trans-unit.source: Premium Connectors
trans-unit.target: Premium Connectors

trans-unit.source: The following table lists all the available Connectors and API Apps created by Microsoft available in Premium Connectors:
trans-unit.target: The following table lists all the available Connectors and API Apps created by Microsoft available in Premium Connectors:

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: AS2 Connector
trans-unit.target: AS2 Connector

trans-unit.source: Can receive and send messages using the AS2 transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: Can receive and send messages using the AS2 transport protocol.

trans-unit.source: Data is transported securely and reliably using digital certificates and encryption.
trans-unit.target: Data is transported securely and reliably using digital certificates and encryption.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk EDIFACT
trans-unit.target: BizTalk EDIFACT

trans-unit.source: Receives and sends messages using the EDIFACT protocol in business-to-business communications.
trans-unit.target: Receives and sends messages using the EDIFACT protocol in business-to-business communications.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk X12
trans-unit.target: BizTalk X12

trans-unit.source: Receives and sends messages using the X12 protocol in business-to-business communications.
trans-unit.target: Receives and sends messages using the X12 protocol in business-to-business communications.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Trading Partner Management
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Trading Partner Management

trans-unit.source: Defines and persists business-to-business relationships using partners, agreements, and schemas and certificates used in agreements.
trans-unit.target: Defines and persists business-to-business relationships using partners, agreements, and schemas and certificates used in agreements.

trans-unit.source: These relationships are enforced using the AS2, EDIFACT, and X12 API Apps.
trans-unit.target: These relationships are enforced using the AS2, EDIFACT, and X12 API Apps.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk JSON Encoder
trans-unit.target: BizTalk JSON Encoder

trans-unit.source: An encoder and decoder that helps your app interop between JSON and XML data.
trans-unit.target: An encoder and decoder that helps your app interop between JSON and XML data.

trans-unit.source: It can convert a given JSON instance to XML and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: It can convert a given JSON instance to XML and vice versa.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Rules
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Rules

trans-unit.source: Use BizTalk Rules to define and control the business logic within an organization.
trans-unit.target: Use BizTalk Rules to define and control the business logic within an organization.

trans-unit.source: Business policies can be updated without recompiling or without redeploying the associated applications.
trans-unit.target: Business policies can be updated without recompiling or without redeploying the associated applications.

trans-unit.source: DB2 Connector
trans-unit.target: DB2 Connector

trans-unit.source: Connects to an IBM DB2 database on-premises and on an Azure virtual machine running a Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: Connects to an IBM DB2 database on-premises and on an Azure virtual machine running a Windows operating system.

trans-unit.source: Can map Web API and OData API operations to Informix Structured Query Language commands.
trans-unit.target: Can map Web API and OData API operations to Informix Structured Query Language commands.

trans-unit.source: No triggers.
trans-unit.target: No triggers.

trans-unit.source: Actions include table select, insert, update, delete, and custom statement
trans-unit.target: Actions include table select, insert, update, delete, and custom statement

trans-unit.source: This connector also includes the Microsoft Client for DRDA to connect to an Informix server across a TCP/IP network.
trans-unit.target: This connector also includes the Microsoft Client for DRDA to connect to an Informix server across a TCP/IP network.

trans-unit.source: Informix
trans-unit.target: Informix

trans-unit.source: Connects to an IBM Informix database, on-premises and on an Azure virtual machine running a Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: Connects to an IBM Informix database, on-premises and on an Azure virtual machine running a Windows operating system.

trans-unit.source: Can map Web API and OData API operations to Informix Structured Query Language commands.
trans-unit.target: Can map Web API and OData API operations to Informix Structured Query Language commands.

trans-unit.source: No triggers.
trans-unit.target: No triggers.

trans-unit.source: Actions include table select, insert, update, delete, and custom statement.
trans-unit.target: Actions include table select, insert, update, delete, and custom statement.

trans-unit.source: When using on-premises, VPN or Azure ExpressRoute can be used.
trans-unit.target: When using on-premises, VPN or Azure ExpressRoute can be used.

trans-unit.source: This connector also includes a Microsoft Client for DRDA to connect to an Informix server across a TCP/IP network.
trans-unit.target: This connector also includes a Microsoft Client for DRDA to connect to an Informix server across a TCP/IP network.

trans-unit.source: MQ
trans-unit.target: MQ

trans-unit.source: Connects to IBM WebSphere MQ Server version 8, on-premises and on an Azure virtual machine running a Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: Connects to IBM WebSphere MQ Server version 8, on-premises and on an Azure virtual machine running a Windows operating system.

trans-unit.source: When using on-premises, VPN or Azure ExpressRoute can be used.
trans-unit.target: When using on-premises, VPN or Azure ExpressRoute can be used.

trans-unit.source: The connector also includes the Microsoft Client for MQ.
trans-unit.target: The connector also includes the Microsoft Client for MQ.

trans-unit.source: No triggers.
trans-unit.target: No triggers.

trans-unit.source: No actions.
trans-unit.target: No actions.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Currently cannot be used with Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Currently cannot be used with Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: Oracle Database
trans-unit.target: Oracle Database

trans-unit.source: Connects to on-premises Oracle Database and can create, update, get, and delete entries on a database table.
trans-unit.target: Connects to on-premises Oracle Database and can create, update, get, and delete entries on a database table.

trans-unit.source: SAP
trans-unit.target: SAP

trans-unit.source: Connects to an on-premises SAP server and invokes RFCs, BAPIs and tRFCs, and send IDOCs.
trans-unit.target: Connects to an on-premises SAP server and invokes RFCs, BAPIs and tRFCs, and send IDOCs.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Flat File Encoder
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Flat File Encoder

trans-unit.source: Provides interoperability between flat file data (like excel and csv) and XML data.
trans-unit.target: Provides interoperability between flat file data (like excel and csv) and XML data.

trans-unit.source: This API App can convert a flat file instance to XML and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: This API App can convert a flat file instance to XML and vice versa.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Transform Service
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Transform Service

trans-unit.source: Converts data from one format to another format.
trans-unit.target: Converts data from one format to another format.

trans-unit.source: You can also upload an existing map (.trfm file), view the links between the source and target schemas, and use 'Test’ functionality with sample input XML content.
trans-unit.target: You can also upload an existing map (.trfm file), view the links between the source and target schemas, and use 'Test’ functionality with sample input XML content.

trans-unit.source: Different built-in functions are also available, including string manipulations, conditional assignment, and more.
trans-unit.target: Different built-in functions are also available, including string manipulations, conditional assignment, and more.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XML Validator
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XML Validator

trans-unit.source: Validates XML data against predefined XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: Validates XML data against predefined XML schemas.

trans-unit.source: You can use existing schemas or generate schemas based on a flat file instance, JSON instance, or existing connectors.
trans-unit.target: You can use existing schemas or generate schemas based on a flat file instance, JSON instance, or existing connectors.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk XPath Extractor
trans-unit.target: BizTalk XPath Extractor

trans-unit.source: Looks up and extracts data from XML content based on an XPath you choose.
trans-unit.target: Looks up and extracts data from XML content based on an XPath you choose.

trans-unit.source: Connectors as Triggers
trans-unit.target: Connectors as Triggers

trans-unit.source: Several connectors provide triggers for Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: Several connectors provide triggers for Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: These triggers are of two types:
trans-unit.target: These triggers are of two types:

trans-unit.source: Poll Triggers: These triggers poll your service at a specified frequency to check for new data.
trans-unit.target: Poll Triggers: These triggers poll your service at a specified frequency to check for new data.

trans-unit.source: When new data is available, a new instance of your Logic App runs with the data as input.
trans-unit.target: When new data is available, a new instance of your Logic App runs with the data as input.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the same data from being consumed multiple times, the trigger may clean-up data that has been read and passed to the Logic App.
trans-unit.target: To prevent the same data from being consumed multiple times, the trigger may clean-up data that has been read and passed to the Logic App.

trans-unit.source: Examples of such connectors are File, SQL, and Azure Storage.
trans-unit.target: Examples of such connectors are File, SQL, and Azure Storage.

trans-unit.source: Push Triggers: These triggers listen for data on an endpoint or for an event to occur.
trans-unit.target: Push Triggers: These triggers listen for data on an endpoint or for an event to occur.

trans-unit.source: Then, trigger a new instance of a Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Then, trigger a new instance of a Logic App.

trans-unit.source: Examples of such connectors are HTTP Listener and Twitter.
trans-unit.target: Examples of such connectors are HTTP Listener and Twitter.

trans-unit.source: Connectors as Actions
trans-unit.target: Connectors as Actions

trans-unit.source: Connectors can also be used as actions within your Logic App.
trans-unit.target: Connectors can also be used as actions within your Logic App.

trans-unit.source: Actions are useful for looking up data within the Logic App that can then used in the execution.
trans-unit.target: Actions are useful for looking up data within the Logic App that can then used in the execution.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may need to look up data from a SQL database for additional information about a customer when processing an order.
trans-unit.target: For example, you may need to look up data from a SQL database for additional information about a customer when processing an order.

trans-unit.source: Or, you may need to write, update or delete data in a destination.
trans-unit.target: Or, you may need to write, update or delete data in a destination.

trans-unit.source: You can do this using the actions provided by the connectors.
trans-unit.target: You can do this using the actions provided by the connectors.

trans-unit.source: Actions map to operations in API Apps (as defined by their Swagger metadata).
trans-unit.target: Actions map to operations in API Apps (as defined by their Swagger metadata).

trans-unit.source: Create your own Connectors and API Apps
trans-unit.target: Create your own Connectors and API Apps
